Question.Subject: dsi pink internet connection problem?
Question.Content: ive just brought the missus a dsi pink ,weve got wireless virgin broadband but the dsi wont connect any ideas why not and does anyone know how to sort it thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
what connection steps is it doing, or not doing? is it finding your router?
general troubleshooting here: http://www.ehow.com/how_4890413_connect-nintendo-dsi-internet.html
good luck!

Answer.Content:
what connection steps is it doing, or not doing? is it finding your router?
general troubleshooting here: http://www.ehow.com/how_4890413_connect-nintendo-dsi-internet.html
good luck!

My ds was not connecting to the internet but i got all my help from this site:
http://www.nintendo.co.uk/NOE/en_GB/support/nintendo_wi-fi_connection_12495_12498.html
when you get to this page, scroll down and click Auto Search. thewn follow the instructions.
now i have no problem with it. its working perfectly.
